title: FO says India has brought countries ‘closer to war’ - DAWN.COM
content:
Pakistan’s foreign ministry spokesman said that India was to blame for bringing the two nuclear-armed neighbours closer to war, AFP reports.

“It is most unfortunate that India’s reckless conduct has brought the two nuclear-armed states closer to a major conflict,” Shafqat Ali Khan said in a press briefing in Islamabad.

“India’s jingoism and war hysteria should be a source of serious concern for the world.”
